 2010-12842010-10-21,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectJames, The Hon. Martin S., RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period from January 29 to April 30, 2010, during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to the Hon. MARTIN S. JAMES, who was required to relocate to the City of Pembroke, Ontario, following his appointment on July 29, 2009, as a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
